review.title: “ok”
review.pros: Pros – If you're in college and want to focus most on studies while working at a "no-thinking" job, this is the job for you.
review.cons: Cons – One manager is not professional at all, which gives off a very bad impression of the work place. Other workers (younger ones) are not being held accountable for loudness/playfulness when guests have arrived to enjoy dining and atmosphere.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – More team meetings. Maybe etiquette classes a requirement for everyone.

review.title: “Unstructured, disorganized and inconsistent”
review.pros: Pros – If other possible employers do not FROWN upon you having worked here, they will most likely understand why you no longer do.
review.cons: Cons – Serious health, safety and TABC violations. Poor structure. Low morale.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The owner truly needs to be involved hands on. Ge probably has NO IDEA of the malpractice going on at his locations.
